signature.instructions: Generate a complete YAWL workflow signature with proper XML schema validation

inputs.business_process_desc: Process customer orders from placement to fulfillment

few_shot_examples.outputs:
http://www.yawlfoundation.org/yawlschema
<schema>
  <process id="OrderProcessing" name="Order Processing">
    <inputs>
      <data id="customer_id" type="String"/>
      <data id="order_items" type="List"/>
      <data id="shipping_address" type="String"/>
    </inputs>
    <outputs>
      <data id="order_id" type="String"/>
      <data id="status" type="String"/>
      <data id="tracking_number" type="String"/>
    </outputs>
    <constraints>
      <sla value="24"/>
      <validation id="inventory"/>
    </constraints>
  </process>
</schema>

http://www.yawlfoundation.org/yawlschema
<schema>
  <process id="LoanApproval" name="Loan Approval Process">
    <inputs>
      <data id="applicant_info" type="String"/>
      <data id="credit_score" type="Integer"/>
      <data id="loan_amount" type="Decimal"/>
    </inputs>
    <outputs>
      <data id="decision" type="String"/>
      <data id="interest_rate" type="Decimal"/>
      <data id="loan_terms" type="String"/>
    </outputs>
    <constraints>
      <credit_threshold value="650"/>
      <max_loan value="500000"/>
    </constraints>
  </process>
</schema>

signature.instructions: Generate YAWL workflow net structure with proper transitions and joins

inputs.name: tasks
inputs.description: List of tasks with their properties

inputs.routing_logic: Parallel execution of inventory and payment, sequential shipping

few_shot_examples.outputs:
http://www.yawlfoundation.org/yawlschema
<net>
  <process id="OrderProcessing">
    <input_condition id="start"/>
    <tasks>
      <task id="ValidateOrder" name="Validate Customer Order">
        <input_flows>
          <flow from="start"/>
        </input_flows>
        <output_flows>
          <flow to="CheckInventory"/>
          <flow to="ProcessPayment"/>
        </output_flows>
      </task>
      <task id="CheckInventory" name="Check Inventory Levels">
        <input_flows>
          <flow from="ValidateOrder"/>
        </input_flows>
        <output_flows>
          <flow to="JoinInventoryPayment"/>
        </output_flows>
      </task>
      <task id="ProcessPayment" name="Process Payment">
        <input_flows>
          <flow from="ValidateOrder"/>
        </input_flows>
        <output_flows>
          <flow to="JoinInventoryPayment"/>
        </output_flows>
      </task>
      <task id="ShipOrder" name="Ship Order">
        <input_flows>
          <flow from="JoinInventoryPayment"/>
        </input_flows>
        <output_flows>
          <flow to="NotifyCustomer"/>
        </output_flows>
      </task>
      <task id="NotifyCustomer" name="Notify Customer">
        <input_flows>
          <flow from="ShipOrder"/>
        </input_flows>
        <output_flows>
          <flow to="end"/>
        </output_flows>
      </task>
    </tasks>
    <join_condition id="JoinInventoryPayment"/>
    <output_condition id="end"/>
  </process>
</net>

signature.instructions: Generate YAWL workflow constraints including SLAs, dependencies, and business rules

few_shot_examples.outputs:
http://www.yawlfoundation.org/yawlschema
<constraints>
  <business_rules>
    <rule id="credit_score_threshold">
      <condition>credit_score > 650</condition>
      <action>proceed_to_evaluation</action>
    </rule>
    <rule id="loan_amount_limit">
      <condition>loan_amount <= 500000</condition>
      <action>allow_processing</action>
    </rule>
    <rule id="employment_requirement">
      <condition>employment_years >= 3</condition>
      <action>approve_loan</action>
    </rule>
  </business_rules>
  <sla_constraints>
    <sla id="decision_response" value="48" unit="hours">
      <description>Loan decision must be made within 48 hours</description>
    </sla>
    <sla id="document_processing" value="2" unit="hours">
      <description>All documents must be processed within 2 hours</description>
    </sla>
  </sla_constraints>
  <data_dependencies>
    <dependency id="credit_impact">
      <source>credit_score</source>
      <target>interest_rate</target>
      <type="calculation"/>
    </dependency>
    <dependency id="employment_impact">
      <source>employment_history</source>
      <target>decision</target>
      <type="validation"/>
    </dependency>
  </data_dependencies>
</constraints>
